title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Cowboys with Matt Mosley, Marcus Thompson on Warriors, KD and Steph, NFL Week 12 Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Cowboys with Matt Mosley, Marcus Thompson on Warriors, KD and Steph, NFL Week 12 Bets
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes of week, including why the Giants’ offensive mess reminds Colin of a restaurant in El Paso (3:00), how Kirk Cousins is like the housing market (8:00), why the Colts and Carson Wentz have quieted the doubters, (9:00) and why Baker Mayfield is falling into Jay Cutler territory (11:00). Then, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley joins Colin all the way from Paris to discuss how Dak’s weaknesses got exposed in the loss to the Chiefs (13:00), how much the Cowboys’ injuries excuse Dak’s struggles (15:00). Next, Colin explains The Athletic Bay Area columnist Marcus Thompson, and Colin discuss how the Warriors resurgence made Marcus feel like “the idiot” (23:00), what he expects from Klay Thompson when he returns (26:00) and the fallout from the Steph/KD breakup (28:00). And finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 12 bets are “sharp” or “square” with his for Rams/Packers (31:00), Seahawks/WFT (33:00), Chargers/Broncos (36:00) picks.

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
